title: SMC_TRAFO_GantryT2 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFO_GantryT2
Reverse transformation for T-gantry systems with stationary drives.
Note
For detailed information on transformations
see overview to
SM_Trafo_POUs
.

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment: Set target position vector (x,y), output of the interpolator.

rows.Name: da
rows.Comment: Set target position of axis a

rows: Set target position of axis b
